alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 22 at 3:37AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Light snow and sleet will be possible but with accumulations expected to be less than 1 inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, dangerously cold wind chills are expected. Wind chills could reach as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Hamilton and York Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
